title: The New Look and Feel of Apache Kafka 4.0
author: Jelani Harper
description: Apache Kafka 4.0 significantly streamlines the platform by replacing ZooKeeper with KRaft for default metadata management.
cntitle: Apache Kafka 4.0 的全新外观和体验
cndescription: Apache Kafka 4.0 通过使用 KRaft 替代 ZooKeeper 进行默认元数据管理，从而显著简化了平台。
